metadata.description: Input the name of your OMS Workspace

templates.name: CF-Average CPU Usage by Application Instance
templates.query: CF_ContainerMetric_CL | summarize avg(CPUPercentage_d) by Environment_s, ApplicationName_s, InstanceIndex_d, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Average Memory Usage by Application Instance
templates.query: CF_ContainerMetric_CL | summarize avg(MemoryBytes_d) by Environment_s, ApplicationName_s, InstanceIndex_d, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Average Memory Quota Application Instance
templates.query: CF_ContainerMetric_CL | summarize avg(MemoryBytesQuota_d) by Environment_s, ApplicationName_s, InstanceIndex_d, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Average Disk Usage by Application Instance
templates.query: CF_ContainerMetric_CL | summarize avg(DiskBytes_d) by Environment_s, ApplicationName_s, InstanceIndex_d, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Average Disk Quota Application Instance
templates.query: CF_ContainerMetric_CL | summarize avg(DiskBytesQuota_d) by Environment_s, ApplicationName_s, InstanceIndex_d, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Total BBS Request Count
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Origin_s == "bbs" and Name_s == "RequestCount" | summarize max(Total_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, IP_s

templates.name: CF-BBS Request Latency
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "bbs" and Name_s == "RequestLatency" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, IP_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Total Convergence LRP & Task Runs
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Origin_s == "bbs" and (Name_s == "ConvergenceLRPRuns" or Name_s == "ConvergenceTaskRuns") | summarize max(Total_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s

templates.name: CF-Total Convergence Tasks Kicked & Pruned
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Origin_s == "bbs" and (Name_s == "ConvergenceTasksKicked" or Name_s == "ConvergenceTasksPruned") | summarize max(Total_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s

templates.name: CF-Convergence LRP & Task Duration
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "bbs" and (Name_s == "ConvergenceLRPDuration" or Name_s == "ConvergenceTaskDuration") | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Malformed LRPs
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "bbs" and (Name_s == "ConvergenceLRPDuration" or Name_s == "ConvergenceLRPPreProcessing") | summarize max(Total_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s

templates.name: CF-Number of HTTP Responses
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "cc" and Name_s contains_cs "http_status" | summarize max(Value_d) by Environment_s, IP_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Job Queue Length
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "cc" and Name_s contains_cs "job_queue_length" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Failed Job Count
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "cc" and Name_s contains_cs "failed_job_count" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Number of Requests Completed
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "cc" and Name_s == "requests.completed" | summarize max(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, IP_s

templates.name: CF-Number of Requests Being Processed
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "cc" and Name_s == "requests.outstanding" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, IP_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Number of Log Messages
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "cc" and Name_s contains_cs "log_count" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, IP_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Total & Remaining Containers
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "rep" and Name_s contains_cs "Containers" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, IP_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Total & Remaining Memory
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "rep" and Name_s contains_cs "Memory" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, IP_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Total & Remaining Disk
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "rep" and Name_s contains_cs "Disk" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, IP_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Number of CPUs
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Name_s == "numCPUS" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, IP_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Number of Go Routines
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Name_s == "numGoRoutines" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, IP_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Memory Usage
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Name_s == "memoryStats.numBytesAllocated" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, IP_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Stack Allocator Memory Usage
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Name_s == "memoryStats.numBytesAllocatedStack" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, IP_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Main Heap Memory Usage
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Name_s == "memoryStats.numBytesAllocatedHeap" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, IP_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Garbage Collector Pause Duration
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Name_s == "memoryStats.lastGCPauseTimeNS" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, IP_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Number of Memory Allocations
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Name_s == "memoryStats.numMallocs" | summarize max(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, IP_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Number of Memory Deallocations
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Name_s == "memoryStats.numFrees" | summarize max(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, IP_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Total Auctions
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Origin_s == "auctioneer" and Name_s contains_cs "Auctions" | summarize max(Total_d) by Environment_s, Name_s

templates.name: CF-Auctions per Minute
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Origin_s == "auctioneer" and Name_s contains_cs "Auctions" | summarize sum(Delta_d) by Environment_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)

templates.name: CF-Fetch States Duration
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "auctioneer" and Name_s == "AuctioneerFetchStatesDuration" | summarize max(Value_d) by Environment_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-CF Apps Synchronized
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "bbs" and Name_s == "Domain.cf-apps" | summarize min(Value_d) by Environment_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-CF Tasks Synchronized
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "bbs" and Name_s == "Domain.cf-tasks" | summarize min(Value_d) by Environment_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Unhealthy Cells
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "rep" and Name_s == "UnhealthyCell" | summarize max(Value_d) by Environment_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Number of Sinks
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "DopplerServer" and Name_s contains_cs "messageRouter.numberOf" | summarize max(Value_d) by Environment_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Number of Messages Unmarshalled
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Origin_s == "DopplerServer" and Name_s contains_cs "dropsondeUnmarshaller" and Name_s != "dropsondeUnmarshaller.unmarshalErrors" | summarize max(Total_d) by Environment_s, Name_s

templates.name: CF-Number of Messages Received by Listeners
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Origin_s == "DopplerServer" and Name_s == "listeners.totalReceivedMessageCount" | summarize max(Total_d) by Environment_s

templates.name: CF-Unmarshal Errors
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Origin_s == "DopplerServer" and Name_s == "dropsondeUnmarshaller.unmarshalErrors" | summarize max(Total_d) by Environment_s

templates.name: CF-Dropped Messages
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Origin_s == "DopplerServer" and (Name_s == "TruncatingBuffer.totalDroppedMessages" or Name_s == "doppler.shedEnvelopes") | summarize max(Total_d) by Environment_s, Name_s

templates.name: CF-Leader
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "etcd" and Name_s == "IsLeader" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, IP_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Followers
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "etcd" and Name_s == "Followers" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, IP_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Watchers
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "etcd" and Name_s == "Watchers" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, IP_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Raft Term
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "etcd" and Name_s == "RaftTerm" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, IP_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Raft Index
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "etcd" and Name_s == "RaftIndex" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, IP_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Sending & Receiving Bandwidth Rate
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "etcd" and Name_s contains_cs "BandwidthRate" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Sending & Receiving Request Rate
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "etcd" and Name_s contains_cs "RequestRate" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Latency
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "etcd" and Name_s == "Latency" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, IP_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Sent & Received Append Requests Rate
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "etcd" and Name_s contains_cs "AppendRequests" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Sets Success & Fail
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "etcd" and Name_s contains_cs "Sets" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Gets Success & Fail
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "etcd" and Name_s contains_cs "Gets" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Create Success & Fail
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "etcd" and Name_s contains_cs "Create" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Update Success & Fail
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "etcd" and Name_s contains_cs "Update" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Delete Success & Fail
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "etcd" and (Name_s == "DeleteSuccess" or Name_s == "DeleteFail") | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-CompareAndDelete Success & Fail
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "etcd" and Name_s contains_cs "CompareAndDelete" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-CompareAndSwap Success & Fail
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "etcd" and Name_s contains_cs "CompareAndSwap" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Number of Container Backing Store Files
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "garden-linux" and Name_s == "BackingStores" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, IP_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Number of Directories in the Garden Depot
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "garden-linux" and Name_s == "LoopDevices" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, IP_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Number of Attached Loop Devices
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "garden-linux" and Name_s == "DepotDirs" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, IP_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-LRPs
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "bbs" and Name_s contains_cs "LRPs" and Name_s !contains_cs "Crash" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Tasks
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "bbs" and Name_s contains_cs "Tasks" and Name_s !contains_cs "Convergence" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Crashing LRPs
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "bbs" and Name_s contains_cs "Crash" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Desired LRP Sync Duration
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "nsync_bulker" and Name_s == "DesiredLRPSyncDuration" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Sent & Received Dropsonde Envelopes
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Origin_s == "MetronAgent" and Name_s contains_cs "Envelopes" | summarize max(Total_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s

templates.name: CF-Messages Unmarshalled
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Origin_s == "MetronAgent" and ((Name_s contains_cs "dropsondeUnmarshaller" and Name_s contains_cs "Received") or Name_s == "dropsondeUnmarshaller.logMessageTotal") | summarize max(Total_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s

templates.name: CF-Dropsonde Messages Received by Agent Listener
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Origin_s == "MetronAgent" and Name_s == "dropsondeAgentListener.receivedMessageCount" | summarize max(Total_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s

templates.name: CF-Dropsonde Bytes Received by Agent Listener
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Origin_s == "MetronAgent" and Name_s == "dropsondeAgentListener.receivedByteCount" | summarize max(Total_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s

templates.name: CF-Messages Sent to Doppler
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Origin_s == "MetronAgent" and Name_s contains_cs "sentMessageCount" | summarize max(Total_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s

templates.name: CF-Bytes Sent to Doppler
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Origin_s == "MetronAgent" and Name_s contains_cs "sentByteCount" | summarize max(Total_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s

templates.name: CF-Errors Sent to Doppler
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Origin_s == "MetronAgent" and Name_s contains_cs "sendErrorCount" | summarize max(Total_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s

templates.name: CF-Number of Routes
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "route_emitter" and Name_s == "RoutesTotal" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Total Routes Registered, Synced and Unregistered
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Origin_s == "route_emitter" and (Name_s == "RoutesRegistered" or Name_s == "RoutesSynced" or Name_s == "RoutesUnregistered") | summarize max(Total_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s

templates.name: CF-Total Registration Messages Emitted
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Origin_s == "route_emitter" and Name_s == "MessagesEmitted" | summarize max(Total_d) by Environment_s, Job_s

templates.name: CF-Route Emitter Time to Sync
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "route_emitter" and Name_s == "RouteEmitterSyncDuration" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Requests per Minute
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Origin_s == "gorouter" and (Name_s == "rejected_requests" or Name_s == "total_requests") | summarize sum(Delta_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)

templates.name: CF-Responses per Minute
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Origin_s == "gorouter" and Name_s contains_cs "responses" | summarize sum(Delta_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)

templates.name: CF-Total Requests
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Origin_s == "gorouter" and (Name_s == "rejected_requests" or Name_s == "total_requests") | summarize max(Total_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s

templates.name: CF-Total Responses
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Origin_s == "gorouter" and Name_s contains_cs "responses" | summarize max(Total_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s

templates.name: CF-Latency
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "gorouter" and Name_s contains_cs "latency" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Route Lookup Time
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "gorouter" and Name_s == "route_lookup_time" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Register Messages Received per Minute
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Origin_s == "gorouter" and Name_s contains_cs "registry_message" | summarize sum(Delta_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)

templates.name: CF-Total Register Messages Received
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Origin_s == "gorouter" and Name_s contains_cs "registry_message" | summarize max(Total_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, Name_s

templates.name: CF-Total Routes Registered
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "gorouter" and Name_s == "total_routes" | summarize avg(Value_d) by Environment_s, Job_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-User & Non-user Not Found
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "uaa" and Name_s contains_cs "not_found_count" | summarize max(Value_d) by Environment_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Failed Non-user Authentication Attempts
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "uaa" and Name_s == "audit_service.principal_authentication_failure_count" | summarize max(Value_d) by Environment_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Successful & Failed User Authentications
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "uaa" and Name_s contains_cs "user_authentication" | summarize max(Value_d) by Environment_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Successful & Failed Client Authentications
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "uaa" and Name_s contains_cs "client_authentication" | summarize max(Value_d) by Environment_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Successful & Failed Password Changes
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Origin_s == "uaa" and Name_s contains_cs "user_password" | summarize max(Value_d) by Environment_s, Name_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Receiving Rate by Nozzle Instance Every 5 Minutes
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Job_s == "nozzle" and Name_s == "eventsReceived" | summarize sum(Delta_d) by NozzleInstance_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Sending Rate by Nozzle Instance Every 5 Minutes
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Job_s == "nozzle" and Name_s == "eventsSent" | summarize sum(Delta_d) by NozzleInstance_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Lost Messages by Nozzle Instance
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Job_s == "nozzle" and Name_s == "eventsLost" | summarize max(Total_d) by NozzleInstance_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

templates.name: CF-Total Recieved, Sent & Lost Messages by Nozzle Instance
templates.query: CF_CounterEvent_CL | where Job_s == "nozzle" | summarize max(Total_d) by NozzleInstance_s, Name_s

templates.name: CF-Slow Consumer Alert
templates.query: CF_ValueMetric_CL | where Name_s == "slowConsumerAlert" | summarize max(Value_d) by NozzleInstance_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
